abstract: Update | 2:36 p.m. After suffering enormous losses, the hedge fund manager Daniel Zwirn is preparing to cede control of his firm, D.B. Zwirn & Company, to another fund manager who will liquidate its holdings.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:36 p.m. After suffering enormous losses, the hedge fund manager Daniel Zwirn is preparing to cede control of his firm, D.B. Zwirn & Company, to another fund manager who will liquidate its holdings.

headline.main: Zwirn Preparing to Cede Control of Hedge Fund
